  • All Classes
 

Package gamelogic

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TerrainModel
    Abstract representation of a terrain model.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Edge
    This class provides the abstract edge model for the edges used in the nodal system.
    Element
    A simple class that hold a name and image attributes, useful for reusing interface elements on species and surfaces
    Entity
    Each entity is part of a species.
    GameManager
    The game manager is responsible for the initialization and evolution of the game state at each frame using the rules defined by the user.
    GameManagerBuilder
    Class with only static methods meant to build new game managers when the user wants to start a new project or to load previously saved projects.
    ImageFile
    Utility class used for handling images in the saving and loading process.
    Input
    This class provides the abstract model for the input(s) of the nodes in the nodal system.
    Network
    This class provides the abstract model for the networks with in the nodal system when defining rules for the game.
    Node
    This class provides the abstract node model for the nodes used in the nodal system.
    Output
    This class provides the abstract model for the output(s) of the nodes in the nodal system.
    Rule<T extends TerminalNode>
    Abstract model for the rules defined by the user through a network of operators.
    Saver
    The goal of the Saver class is to save and load a project's GameManager from a savefile.

    Saving a project is done in several steps.
    The first one is to create a temporary work folder.
    Then we serialize the GameManger into a txt file in this folder.
    After, another txt file is created to list all the images used by the surfaces.
    Species
    A species represents a group of homogeneous entities, which all behave according to the same rules.
    Surface
    Each instance of this class represents a different kind of surface that can be stored on a tile.
    TerminalNode<R extends Rule>
    Abstract class for terminal nodes which are connected to rules.
    Terrain
    Representation of the terrain as a list of slots.
    TerrainNode<T extends TerrainModel>
    Abstract model for nodes used in the terrain network to define a specific terrain layer.
    TerrainSlot
    Representation of a slot used to link the terrain network to the actual terrain model.
    Vec2D
    An instance of the Vec2D class is a 2D vector with integer coordinates.
    Some basic operations for these vectors are implemented, such as addition, substraction, equality testing, dot product, etc.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NetworkIOException
    Exception raised by an input or an output when it is asked to read or write an invalid data (usually a null value).
